name: Sea Tiger
description:
Sea Tiger

A retro-arcade side scroller. Take on the forces of the evil Captain Argo in your submarine, the Sea Tiger. Fire torpedoes. Launch rockets. Drop depth-charges. Battle mines, destroyers, enemy submarines, and Captain Argo himself.

How to Play Controls

F11 - Toggle Fullscreen

W,A,S,D - Move

Space - Fire torpedo

Q - Drop depth charge

E - Fire rocket

ESC - pause, resume, and quit

Limited controller support. The UI does not respond to controller operation. Use your mouse.  When using the controller:

Left stick - Move

Right button - Fire torpedo (B on XBox)

Down button - Drop depth charge (A on XBox)

Up button - Launch rocker (Y on XBox)

Tips and Tricks

You have 4 lives. When you run out of lives, the game is over. The game will restart at the beginning with 4 more lives.

Your air meter is at the top-left of the screen. You lose a life when your sub runs out of air. Every action uses air (e.g., accelerating, firing a torpedo, taking damage). An alarm will sound and the meter will change colors when you are low on air.
